categories: Category:Star Wars radio and audio drama voice actors

nodes.text: Carol Monda is a veteran actress and audiobook narrator who narrated the novel Shadow Fall. She provided narration for the stories "Reirin", "Beru Whitesun Lars", and "Contingency Plan" in the audiobook of From a Certain Point of View. She also voiced Lene Kostana in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost.
